steps.action: CREATE TABLE `datasetrss` (id int PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, dataSetId int NOT NULL, psk varchar(254) NOT NULL, title varchar(254), author varchar(254), titleColumnId int, summaryColumnId int, contentColumnId int, publishedDateColumnId int, sort text, filter text) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
ALTER TABLE `datasetrss` ADD CONSTRAINT datasetrss_dataset_DataSetID_fk FOREIGN KEY (dataSetId) REFERENCES dataset (DataSetID);
